# sakura_apigw_user (Data Source)

Get information about an existing API Gateway User.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sakura_apigw_user" "foobar" {
  name = "foobar"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the API Gateway User.
- `name` (String) The name of the API Gateway User.

### Read-Only

- `authentication` (Attributes) Authentication information of the API Gateway User (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--authentication))
- `created_at` (String) The creation timestamp of the API Gateway User
- `custom_id` (String) The custom ID of the API Gateway User
- `groups` (Attributes List) Groups associated with the user (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--groups))
- `ip_restriction` (Attributes) IP restriction configuration for the user (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ip_restriction))
- `tags` (Set of String) The tags of the API Gateway User.
- `updated_at` (String) The last update timestamp of the API Gateway User

<a id="nestedatt--authentication"></a>
### Nested Schema for `authentication`

Optional:

- `hmac_auth` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--authentication--hmac_auth))

Read-Only:

- `basic_auth` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--authentication--basic_auth))
- `jwt` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--authentication--jwt))

<a id="nestedatt--authentication--hmac_auth"></a>
### Nested Schema for `authentication.hmac_auth`

Read-Only:

- `username` (String) The HMAC auth username


<a id="nestedatt--authentication--basic_auth"></a>
### Nested Schema for `authentication.basic_auth`

Read-Only:

- `username` (String) The basic auth username


<a id="nestedatt--authentication--jwt"></a>
### Nested Schema for `authentication.jwt`

Read-Only:

- `algorithm` (String) The JWT algorithm
- `key` (String) The JWT key



<a id="nestedatt--groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `groups`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) ID of the API Gateway Group
- `name` (String) Name of the API Gateway Group


<a id="nestedatt--ip_restriction"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ip_restriction`

Read-Only:

- `ips` (Set of String) The IPv4 addresses to be restricted
- `protocols` (String) The protocols to restrict by
- `restricted_by` (String) The category to restrict by
